title: Enter to win a $1,000 flagship smartphone!*
text:
Google announces new Pixel 4, Pixelbook Go, Nest Mini, and Pixel Buds At its October event Tuesday, Google announced several new devices including Pixel Buds, Pixelbook Go, and the new flagship smartphone: the Pixel 4. Event coverage video courtesy CNET/Google.

(Image: CNET)

Last week Google unveiled its latest addition to the Pixel family. ZDNet will give away a 128GB Google Pixel 4 XL, priced at $999, to one lucky reader!

Also: Google's new Pixel and Nest devices: Prices, release dates, and where to buy

The Pixel 4XL is equipped with a 6.3-inch 90Hz OLED smooth display, new facial recognition features, and dual rear-facing lenses (12.2MP and 16MP) with amazing quality. In fact, Google's Pixel 4 XL "has one of the best cameras around," as noted by CNET. You all won't want to miss out

Looking to be our grand prize winner? First, you must read the rules, accept the terms and conditions of this sweepstakes, and fill out the form below. It doesn't end there! You can increase your chances of winning by unlocking extra entries after following us on social media and more.

Good luck!

If you're having trouble viewing our form, please visit here.
description: One lucky winner will take home a brand new Google Pixel 4 XL. This giveaway ends Oct. 31.
